title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, Appendices, app 104-B
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, Appendices, app 104-B
State Regulations
NACC C-19
(Auth Reg ยง 2010.1)
STATE OF NEW YORK NARCOTIC ADDICTION CONTROL COMMISSION
N. A.C.C. NO. ________
N. Y.S.I.I.S. NO. ________
DETAINER WARRANT
TO ANY PERSON, FACILITY, AGENCY OR JURISDICTION CURRENTLY
HAVING A PRESENT RIGHT OF CUSTODY OF ____________
Pursuant to the authority conferred by Article 9 of the Mental

Hygiene Law and the regulations of the Narcotic Addiction Control Commission, you are hereby notified that ________, a person now within your custody is
subject to a lawful order granting to this Commission custody of his
person. You are therefore commanded, at or shortly before the
termination of your period of custody of the said person, to inform the
undersigned of the impending termination of such custody and to detain the said
person in order that hemay be brought to the actual custody of this Commission, and for so doing this shall be your sufficient Warrant. NEW YORK STATE NARCOTIC ADDICTION
CONTROL COMMISSION
Dated: ________, 19________ Per
____________
Authorized Signature
____________
Typed Signature
____________
Address
________
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 14, Appendices, app
104-B
When resident is available for return to the Commission, please notify the Director of Resident Movement and Control, Narcotic Addiction

Control Commission, 1855 Broadway, New York, New York, 10023--(212)
765-0525. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
